{{cpp/ranges/stride_view/title|stride}}
{{cpp/ranges/stride_view/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++23|
constexpr ranges::range_difference_t&lt;_Vp&gt; stride() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns a copy of the underlying stride object {{rlpi|/#Data members|stride_}}.
Equivalent to {{c|return stride_;}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The stride value.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;ranges&gt;

int main()
{
    constexpr auto view = std::views::iota(1337)
                        {{!}} std::views::stride(42);
    static_assert(view.stride() == 42);
}
}}
